original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo anabhiratiyā pīḷitā ovarakaṁ pavisitvā talaghātakaṁ karonti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyaḥ anabhiratiyā pīḍitāḥ ovarakam pavisitvā talaghātakam karonti

original: Bhikkhuniyo tena saddena upadhāvitvā tā bhikkhuniyo etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ tena saddena upadhāvitvā tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ etat avocuḥ
kissa tumhe ayye purisena saddhim sampadussatha ati

original: “Na mayaṁ, ayye, purisena saddhiṁ sampadussāmā”ti bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: na maya ayye purisena saddhim sampadussāma ati bhikkhunīnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ tala ghātakam karissanti iti pe
saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ tala ghātakam karonti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṁ karissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ tala ghātakam karissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: samphassaṁ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattenapi muttakaraṇe pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: samphassam sādiyantī antamasaḥ mutta karaṇe pahāram deti āpatti pācittiyassa
